DOC.brief_summary: Laser-assisted intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) suggest effective alterative conventional ICSI method insemination indicate patient undergo vitro fertilization ( IVF ) . Laser-assisted ICSI differs conventional ICSI laser use drill small hole hard outer coat surround egg injection needle contain single sperm insert egg . The hole eliminate compression egg normally occur conventional ICSI , thus may reduce chance damage . Laser-assisted ICSI hypothesize result increase egg survival , perhaps improve embryo quality , compare conventional ICSI .
DOC.brief_title: Laser-Assisted Versus Conventional Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection
